item.title: Change namespaces in Kubernetes
item.description: There is no easy way to change namespace in Kubernetes using kubectl command line utility. But here are some commands that you can alias in your bashrc file so that it’s just a single command that you can use to change the namespace in the Kubernetes cluster. Change namespace Let’s see step by step what goes in to change the namespace. So the first step is to find the context.
